attributes.action: Call on the government to regulate the fees charged by Veterinary Practitioners.
attributes.additional_details: So that everyone who has compassion for animals and would like to have a pet is able to do so and we do not become a Nation where only the comfortably-off are able to adopt pets.
attributes.background: Investigate the current charges and put a limit on what can be charged for services, medications etc.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for setting vet fees.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Create a free Animal Health Service for pets please: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/581142
